info.name: WFM Enterprise API - Complete Demo Collection
info.description: Comprehensive API collection demonstrating all 110 endpoints with real-world scenarios

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Customer Support Team Alpha",
    "description": "Primary customer support team for enterprise clients",
    "group_type": "team",
    "department_id": "dept_001",
    "manager_id": "{{employee_id}}"
}

{
    "name": "Customer Support Schedule - Week 1",
    "description": "Weekly schedule for customer support team",
    "start_date": "2024-02-01",
    "end_date": "2024-02-07",
    "schedule_type": "weekly",
    "department_id": "dept_001",
    "template_id": null
}

{
    "name": "Morning Shift",
    "description": "Standard morning shift for customer support",
    "start_time": "08:00:00",
    "end_time": "16:00:00",
    "duration_minutes": 480,
    "break_duration_minutes": 60,
    "break_start_time": "12:00:00",
    "shift_type": "regular",
    "min_staff": 3,
    "max_staff": 8,
    "color_code": "#3498db",
    "required_skills": ["{{skill_id}}"]
}

{
    "name": "Call Volume Forecast - Feb 2024",
    "description": "Monthly call volume forecast for customer support",
    "forecast_type": "call_volume",
    "method": "ml",
    "granularity": "30min",
    "start_date": "2024-02-01T00:00:00Z",
    "end_date": "2024-02-29T23:59:59Z",
    "department_id": "dept_001",
    "service_id": "service_001"
}
